name: InfoWeapons
overview:
InfoWeapons is among the worldwide leaders that create next-generation, fully IPv6-compliant Internet products, including the dual stack (IPv4 and IPv6 capable) DNS/DHCP server appliance, SolidDNSâ„¢. InfoWeapons delivers future-proofed technology solutions that are secure, intuitive and reliable. The company’s products and services enable customers to make the rapid transition to IPv6 technologies.

InfoWeapons’ “built-in security” approach is patterned after Dr. Edward Demming’s built-in… (read more) Products:

  • SolidDNSâ„¢ - The world’s first IPv6 Ready Gold Certified DNS/DHCP network appliance.
  • SolidPBXâ„¢ - IPv6 Ready Gold Certified advanced dual-stack Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) Private Branch Exchange (PBX) network appliance.
  • SolidWallâ„¢ - Multi-function dual-stack firewall, VPN and IPv6 Tunnel end-point (server and client) network appliance.
  • IPv6 Quickstart Kit - consists of SolidDNSâ„¢ SFF Series, SolidWallâ„¢ Lite SOHO model, easy-to-use IPv6 wizards and IPv6 training to help organizations deploy IPv6 quickly and easily.
  • Coming soon: SolidNMPâ„¢ - monitor the health/status of your IT infrastructure and network services over both IPv6 and IPv4 with the Network Monitoring Platform (NMP) appliance solution.

SERVICES: IPv6 Ready Logo Testing and Certification - provides commercial testing and certification of network appliance products and network applications for the IPv6 Ready Logo Phase 1 (Silver) or Phase 2 (Gold) programs. InfoWeapons is one out of 6 official IPv6 Ready Logo Test and Conformance Centers in the world.

IPv6 Forum Certified Training - The InfoWeapons’ courseware offers instructor-led IPv6 training and hands-on laboratory for network and security engineers, programmers, and trainers. Participants who complete the courses receive certificates from the IPv6 Forum, apart from taking away invaluable knowledge from Lawrence Hughes, the IPv6 guru himself!

Free IPv6 Utilities:

SolidIPConfig - IPv6 Configuration Client for Windows XP.

DHCPv6 Client - enables administrators to easily configure DHCPv6 parameters in client machines using a graphical user interface.
